title: The Heavenly Path Is Not Stupid
synopsis: A generic overpowered protagonist rises through the ranks after receiving a mysterious gaming system. High action, low stress.

title: Reincarnated as a Shadow Monarch
synopsis: A weak hunter gets a second chance to become the king of shadows. The art style is top-tier and the world-building is expansive.

title: The Demon Lord's Nanny
synopsis: A slice-of-life comedy about a young woman accidentally becoming the caretaker of a tiny, but immensely powerful, Demon Lord.

title: I Became the Villainess's Best Friend
synopsis: A reader is transmigrated into a novel and decides to save the tragic villainess from her fate, forming an unexpected bond.

title: The Legendary Moonlight Sculptor
synopsis: A man enters a virtual reality game to escape his hardships, becoming a legendary sculptor in the process.

title: The Villainess Reverses the Hourglass
synopsis: A noblewoman uses a magical hourglass to go back in time and change her fate, seeking revenge against those who wronged her.
